codes.APPL: Party named in the undertaking as the “applicant”.
codes.BENE: Party in whose favour the undertaking (or counter-undertaking) is issued.
codes.CONF: Party that adds its undertaking to honour the undertaking.
codes.ISSU: Party that issues the undertaking (or counter-undertaking).
codes.OBLG: Party obligated to reimburse the issuer.
codes.ORDR: Party requested to issue an undertaking on behalf of the applicant. Also known as the ordering institution or applicant's bank.

description: Specifies the external type of party code in the format of a character string with a maximum length of 4 characters. The list of valid codes is an external code list published separately.
name: ExternalTypeOfParty1Code
